channel.title: Flirting With Neutrality
channel.description: Recent content on Flirting With Neutrality

item.title: About
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: My name is Péter Böröcz. I’m am actively retired technology manager and software developer. I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? Content Content on this site is broken down into a few different sections based on my interests and activities: Rides Select pictures and descriptions of my more memorable bike and bikepacking rides. Art Pictures and descriptions of some of the fun art pieces I’ve build.

item.title: First post!

item.description: This is my first post, how exciting!
